issue.title: [Rust - DataFusion] Support boolean negation (NOT)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7795](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7795). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a proposal to support the negation operation NOT.

The user should be able to write something like

```SELECT a, b FROM t WHERE NOT a```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7795?focusedCommentId=17034723) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6384
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6384>
